inputSpec.name: data_dir
inputSpec.label: Directory of outputs to compare dx results to

inputSpec.name: star_log
inputSpec.label: Log file created at DNAnexus by STAR

inputSpec.name: star_bam
inputSpec.label: BAM file created at DNAnexus by STAR

inputSpec.name: rsem_isoform_quant
inputSpec.label: Quantification file created at DNAnexus by RSEM

inputSpec.name: rsem_gene_quant
inputSpec.label: Quantification file crated at DNAnexus by RSEM (genes)

outputSpec.name: log_diff
outputSpec.label: Diff of log files (should be empty)

outputSpec.name: isoform_quant_diff
outputSpec.label: Diff of isoform quantification files (shoudld be empty)

outputSpec.name: gene_quant_diff
outputSpec.label: Diff of gene quantification files (should be empty)
